#summary Some stuff about the MODL struct.

= Introduction =

The MODL block in .m3 files can have two different structs, it seems.


= Details =

The offsets in the block, along with the data type it points to:

|| 0xc   || SEQS ||
|| 0x14  || [STC]  ||
|| 0x1c  || STG  ||

|| 0x48  || U8   ||

|| 0x60  || Extents ||

|| 0xb8  || U16  ||
